document.full_text: kansas city, kansas  _ the kansas senate passed a bill on wednesday that places new limits on abortions after 21 weeks of pregnancy, citing some research findings that suggest after that stage a fetus can feel pain.
document.title: kansas house approves bill limiting abortions after 21 weeks
lines_and_colors: kansas city, kansas  _ the kansas senate passed a bill on wednesday that places new limits on abortions after 21 weeks of pregnancy, citing some research findings that suggest after that stage a fetus can feel pain.
